name: Gunstar
overview: The year 1997 witnessed an unprovoked attack on Earth by a people unknown, our primitive 'Star Wars' defences were quickly overwhelmed and the Earth's population enslaved. The survival of the human race rested in the hands of a research team hidden in the subterranial moon base. After extensive experimentation, they produced a range of fighter craft called Pulse Fighters. They became known as the Gunstar Fleet; their mission - the destruction of the alien forces and the liberation of the Earth.
